glslang 8.13.3743 (latest commit bcf6a2430e99e8fc24f9f266e99316905e6d5134 - April 27, 2020)
	"Khronos reference front-end for GLSL and ESSL, and sample SPIR-V generator"

- Online: https://github.com/KhronosGroup/glslang
- Used for GLSL to SPIR-V compilation
